ai-patthana23.25:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana23.25:1.1_0: We shouldn’t give rise to joy in those without rapture.
ai-patthana23.25:2.1_0: We shouldn’t give rise to joy in those without rapture.
ai-patthana23.25:3.1_0: neither-perception-nor-non-percipient nor non-confusion is a condition for the happiness opposite of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.25:3.1_1: The eighth objects of the basis in brief. ...
ai-patthana23.25:3.1_2: when the four destiny is reborn in the company of the four realms,
